category: National Team Athletes’ Village Operation Regulations/Article 5 (Establishment of Training Plan)
contents: Article 5 (Establishment of training plan) ① The head of the athlete village establishes an annual athlete village training plan (hereinafter referred to as *training plan) at the beginning of each year for efficient operation of the athlete village. ② The training plan must include detailed training plans for each item, target person, and period of entry.
